thread.title: Russell Westbrook Ditched His Team And Warmed Up On Opposite End Of Court Away From Kevin Durant
thread.title_full: Russell Westbrook Ditched His Team And Warmed Up On Opposite End Of Court Away From Kevin Durant

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Russell Westbrook Ditched His Team And Warmed Up On Opposite End Of Court Away From Kevin Durant
text:
Russell Wesbtrook wants nothing to do with Kevin Durant. During warmups before the all-star game, Russell Westbrook ditched his team and practiced on the opposite side of the court to avoid Kevin Durant. 
Russell Westbrook warming up on the opposite end of Kevin Durant with Harden, Kawhi, Anthony Davis. pic.twitter.com/8eDEr34UFl 
— Erik Horne (@ErikHorneOK) February 18, 2017 
Russell Westbrook was practicing away from Kevin Durant and the other West All-Stars so James Harden joined him. pic.twitter.com/R095TCqEnV 
— Arash Markazi (@ArashMarkazi) February 20, 2017 

C’mon Russ.
